QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, nmc_canvas_modules.id odf_pk, nmc_canvas_modules.IS_SYSTEM as is_system, nmc_canvas_modules.code as code, CAPTIONS.NAME as name, nmc_canvas_modules.SOURCE_CANVAS_MODULE as source_canvas_module, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, NMC_CANVAS_MODULES.CREATED_DATE as created_date, nmc_canvas_modules.TYPE as type, NMC_CANVAS_MODULES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, nmc_canvas_modules.BLUEPRINT_ID as blueprint_id , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from nmc_canvas_modules nmc_canvas_modules inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id , srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, cmn_captions_nls CAPTIONS where 1 = 1 and nmc_canvas_modules.created_by = CREATED.user_id and nmc_canvas_modules.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and CAPTIONS.table_name = 'NMC_CANVAS_MODULES' and CAPTIONS.pk_id = nmc_canvas_modules.id and CAPTIONS.language_code = user_context.language_code
